job_tasks.phrase: you are responsible for all the back- end services of Albert Heijn's employee app, called '@AH', used by more than 100.000 employees.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core responsibility of managing and developing backend services for an application, which falls under traditional software development.

job_tasks.phrase: As a passionate Senior Engineer, you own the realization of new features.
job_tasks.justification: Owning the realization of new features is a fundamental software development task, involving the end-to-end process of bringing new functionalities to life.

job_tasks.phrase: You lead the team in keeping up the high security and coding standards of the platform, push the engineering skills of the team, and develop new features using the latest technology.
job_tasks.justification: Leading a team in maintaining standards, enhancing skills, and developing new features are all core software engineering leadership and development activities.

job_tasks.phrase: You participate in standups and refinements, develop code, enforce code quality, develop best practices, write tests and manage the continuous integration of code.
job_tasks.justification: This sentence lists a comprehensive set of traditional software development lifecycle activities, including agile participation, coding, quality assurance, and CI management.

job_tasks.phrase: As a Senior Engineer you support product or platform architects and are the technical point of contact for product owners and heads of tech.
job_tasks.justification: Supporting architects and acting as a technical point of contact are roles that involve technical communication and collaboration within a software development context.

job_tasks.phrase: Beyond your own team, you contribute to the AH Tech community via Guilds, inner source initiatives, and more.
job_tasks.justification: Contributing to a tech community through guilds and inner source initiatives is a software engineering practice focused on knowledge sharing and collaboration.

job_tasks.phrase: Are the Lead software engineer, guiding other back- and front-end developers in developing a feature-rich product for our employees.
job_tasks.justification: Leading other developers in product development is a senior software engineering responsibility.

job_tasks.phrase: Understand how to technically scale the services in the 'employee experience platform', which empower the "@AH app".
job_tasks.justification: Technical scaling of services is a core aspect of robust software engineering and system design.

job_tasks.phrase: Understand how to combine best agile development practices in combination with a services-based architecture.
job_tasks.justification: Combining agile practices with a services-based architecture are fundamental software engineering principles and methodologies.

job_tasks.phrase: Are an expert on 'your' domain (Kotlin back-end services on our Azure Kubernetes platform), though you can also liaise with other senior engineers and their respective technologies (Front and BackEnd).
job_tasks.justification: Expertise in specific backend technologies (Kotlin) and platforms (Azure Kubernetes) falls under the operational and infrastructure aspects of software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Everything we build in the app is scalable, using Azure and Microservices, Kubernetes, CI / CD pipelines.
job_tasks.justification: Mentioning Azure, Microservices, Kubernetes, and CI/CD pipelines directly relates to the operational and infrastructure components of software development and deployment.

job_tasks.phrase: This initiative, building an employee app for your own colleagues, is a priority project for Albert Heijn, with the potential of scaling to other brands within Ahold Delhaize.
job_tasks.justification: Understanding the project's priority and scaling potential within the broader business context aligns with business understanding and strategy.

job_tasks.phrase: As a Senior Engineer you have an impact on the direction of the (technical) part of the app. And the way we work in this project is a blueprint for other teams in our Retail Tech Platform.
job_tasks.justification: Having an impact on the technical direction and setting blueprints for other teams demonstrates an understanding of business strategy and its technical implementation.

job_tasks.phrase: Therefore, we encourage you to share knowledge and best practices with other teams.
job_tasks.justification: Sharing knowledge and best practices across teams contributes to the overall business and technical strategy of the organization.

soft_skills.phrase: You lead the team in keeping up the high security and coding standards of the platform, push the engineering skills of the team, and develop new features using the latest technology.
soft_skills.justification: Leading a team and pushing their engineering skills implies communication and collaboration to foster growth.

soft_skills.phrase: You participate in standups and refinements, develop code, enforce code quality, develop best practices, write tests and manage the continuous integration of code.
soft_skills.justification: Participation in standups and refinements are core agile collaboration activities.

soft_skills.justification: Being a technical point of contact for product owners and heads of tech requires strong communication and collaboration skills.

soft_skills.justification: Contributing to a tech community via guilds and inner source initiatives is a clear indicator of collaboration and knowledge sharing.

soft_skills.phrase: Are the Lead software engineer, guiding other back- and front-end developers in developing a feature-rich product for our employees.
soft_skills.justification: Guiding other developers is a direct form of communication and collaboration to achieve a common goal.

soft_skills.phrase: though you can also liaise with other senior engineers and their respective technologies (Front and BackEnd).
soft_skills.justification: Liaising with other engineers implies communication and collaboration across different technical domains.

soft_skills.phrase: Therefore, we encourage you to share knowledge and best practices with other teams.
soft_skills.justification: Encouraging knowledge and best practice sharing directly relates to communication and collaboration.

soft_skills.phrase: As a passionate Senior Engineer, you own the realization of new features.
soft_skills.justification: Owning the realization of new features demonstrates a sense of ownership and initiative.

soft_skills.phrase: You lead the team in keeping up the high security and coding standards of the platform, push the engineering skills of the team, and develop new features using the latest technology.
soft_skills.justification: Leading a team and pushing engineering skills implies taking initiative and ownership of team development.

soft_skills.phrase: As a Senior Engineer you have an impact on the direction of the (technical) part of the app.
soft_skills.justification: Having an impact on the technical direction shows initiative and ownership of the product's technical evolution.

soft_skills.phrase: And the way we work in this project is a blueprint for other teams in our Retail Tech Platform.
soft_skills.justification: Setting a blueprint for other teams indicates innovation and taking ownership of best practices.

profile.rationale: The job advertisement focuses heavily on traditional software engineering tasks such as backend service development, feature realization, code quality, testing, CI/CD, and leading development teams. While it mentions 'GenAI' as a future roadmap item, the core responsibilities and technologies described (Kotlin, Azure, Kubernetes, Microservices) are firmly rooted in general software engineering. There are no explicit tasks or requirements related to developing, fine-tuning, prompt engineering, or managing Generative AI models themselves. Therefore, the role is classified as a 'Software Engineer'.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear about its focus on backend software development and the technologies involved. The mention of GenAI is in the context of future roadmap items, not current core responsibilities. This clarity makes the analysis straightforward and highly confident.
